document.full_text: to create a more 'attractive presentation,' the badminton world federation has decreed that women must wear skirts or dresses to play at the elite level.
document.title: badminton's new dress code is being criticized as sexist
lines_and_colors: to create a more 'attractive presentation,' the badminton world federation has decreed that women must wear skirts or dresses to play at the elite level.
